alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued June 10 at 4:48PM EDT until June 12 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action and dangerous currents expected at Lake Michigan beaches. Waves 7 to 10 ft expected. * WHERE...Lake IN and Porter Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Swimming conditions will be life threatening, especially for inexperienced swimmers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Waves quickly building to 3 to 5 ft overnight with a cold frontal passage.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid dangerous swimming conditions and do not venture out onto piers, jetties, breakwalls, or other shoreline structures.
